DOC.brief_summary: To determine palatability extent escalate dos novel highly viscous polysaccharide [ NVP ] reduce postprandial glycemia add liquid solid meal .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Escalating Doses Novel Viscous Polysaccharide Postprandial Glycemia
